short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension can be used to block objectionable items from video tube websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension can be used to block objectionable items from video tube websites. If the item's content matches certain keywords, that item will be hidden/blocked from the view.
